Package org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.model

Interface Gene2Genotype

public interface Gene2Genotype
Gene2Genotype represents variants that have been annotated to a single gene. The gene data includes the identifier of a gene, the variants annotated with respect to the gene, and convenience methods for using in the LIRICAL algorithm.

Note, we only need the variants that passed the filtering for the analysis.

      Create Gene2Genotype from provided data.
      Parameters:
      geneId - the gene credentials.
      passingVariants - a collection of variants that passed the initial filtering.
      filteredOutVariantCount - the number of variants that failed the initial filtering.

    • hasVariants

      default boolean hasVariants()

    • pathogenicClinVarCount

      default int pathogenicClinVarCount(String sampleId)
      Get the number of predicted pathogenic/deleterious alleles in the gene for the sampleId.

      Note, only the variant that passed the filtering are considered.

    • deleteriousAlleleCount

      default int deleteriousAlleleCount(String sampleId, float pathogenicityThreshold)
      Get the count of alleles of predicted pathogenic/deleterious variants in the gene for the sampleId. The variants that are both not labeled as benign or likely benign by ClinVar and have the VariantMetadata.pathogenicityScore() at or above the provided pathogenicityThreshold are deemed to be predicted pathogenic/deleterious.

      Note, we take specific precautions to not clash with ClinVar variant interpretation and consider ClinVar benign or likely benign variants as deleterious.

    • getSumOfPathBinScores

      default double getSumOfPathBinScores(String sampleId, float pathogenicityThreshold)
